entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
